'''''"Chimalli's Shade"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Flow-Inverted Wayob Manifestation|text="Chimalli's Shade" — Will of Shields Horned}} while completing challenge conditions.
